verses.name: James 2:23
verses.text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith, Abraham believed God, and it was imputed unto him for righteousness: and he was called the Friend of God.

verses.name: James 2:24
verses.text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified, and not by faith only.

verses.name: James 2:25
verses.text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works, when she had received the messengers, and had sent them out another way?

verses.name: James 2:26
verses.text: For as the body without the spirit is dead, so faith without works is dead also.
